definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Ren2 min2 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Washington (name)/George Washington (1732-1799), first US president/Washington, US State/Washington, D.C. (US federal capital)
abbr. for 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 Da4 xue2]
Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan

sentences.english: It is legal to stay in China only after you have the valid Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 留學生持居留許可在華居住方屬合法。

sentences.english: Wolter products are used both in general building services applications as well as various industrial areas.
sentences.chinese: 華徳產品一般是用在建築服務和各種工業領域。

sentences.english: Huayan is a very famous artist with good reputation in the Chinese painting history.
sentences.chinese: 華嵒是中國繪畫史上享有較高聲譽的一位畫家。

sentences.english: Buying Times will help Lotte increase scale in China, which is critical in such a competitive market.
sentences.chinese: 購買時代零售將有助於樂天百貨擴大在華業務規模。

sentences.english: Japan benefits from those investments it makes in China in terms of corporate profits.
sentences.chinese: 從公司盈利的角度說，日本獲益於在華投資。

sentences.english: I pointed out that the perception of a master-servant relationship should be removed.
sentences.chinese: 我也表明，馬華必須去除和巫統的主從關係。

sentences.english: Beijing is pilfering the technology of US and other foreign firms that set up shop on Chinese soil.
sentences.chinese: 北京盜竊在華開展業務的美國和其他外國公司的技術。

sentences.english: Dr. Howard will be even greater strength and greater faith in the fruits of harvest.
sentences.chinese: 華博士將以更大的實力和信念收穫更大的果實。
爲了華爾德和我的寶貝。

sentences.english: Tom Wilkinson is his arrogant and lascivious patron.
sentences.chinese: 湯韋堅遜是華米亞傲慢及好色的主顧。

sentences.english: What time will you be arriving, Mr. Steward?
sentences.chinese: 斯特華先生，您什麼時間將到達呢？

sentences.english: Cheshire himself has said the business is in a "horrible" state.
sentences.chinese: 柴什曾私下表示在華業務正處於“可怕”的狀態。

sentences.english: Foreign companies in China should bear in mind that business is business and they should operate according to law.
sentences.chinese: 我們要求在華經營的外國企業在商言商，守法經營。

sentences.english: Chinese modern press industry started from the press hold by the foreigners in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國近代報刊業，肇始於外國人在華創辦的報刊。

sentences.english: The introduction of western medicine into China was closely related to the medical activities of western missionaries in China.
sentences.chinese: 西醫學的傳入與傳教士在華的醫學活動分不開。

sentences.english: What are the provisions on foreign experts ' dimission allowance?
sentences.chinese: 外國文教專家在華工作期間可享受哪些節日休假？

definition: feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
